potion.name: Potion
potion.desc: A small red potion. It looks like you would recover some health if you were to drink it.

soma.name: Soma
soma.desc: Juice extracted from the Soma plant. It restores magical energy.

cigar.name: Cigar
cigar.desc: Looks like some kind of leaves have been wrapped in paper.

drachma.name: Drachma
drachma.desc: A small metal coin from antiquity.

bronzeSword.name: BrSword
bronzeSword.desc: A decent sword made of bronze.

ironSword.name: IrSword
ironSword.desc: A nice sword made of iron.

tunic.name: CtnTunic
tunic.desc: A tunic made of a sturdy cloth.
